article_title: More hostages and prisoners swapped on fifth day of truce.
sentence: Hamas  officials  in  Gaza  say  some  1,500  people  are  missing  and  14,500  others  have  been  killed  during  an  Israeli  military  campaign.

article_title: More hostages and prisoners swapped on fifth day of truce.
sentence: Hamas  crossed  the  border  and  killed  1,200  people  in  Israel  on  7  October,  with  about  240  taken  hostage.
